channel.title: General on Leopoldo Caballero
channel.description: Recent content in General on Leopoldo Caballero

item.title: Why this site?
item.description: This domain is almost in its thirteen anniversary, in the first steps was a blog about my GNU/Linux stuff, and a catalog of some weird recording of the cuban songwriter Silvio Rodríguez. The engine behind was JAWS, made by some folks in México.
